data.name: 0000 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Taking Asahina along with me, I came to ask more questions to the computer research society.

data.name: 0001 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Eeek……

data.name: 0002 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There was a strange tension among the computer research society members who stood before us.

data.name: 0003 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: We don't have anything else to tell you. Can't you leave us be?

data.name: 0004 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He's as blunt as a green pheasant… Actually, where does that expression even come from?

data.name: 0005 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sure Koizumi would spill his vast knowledge if I asked him.

data.name: 0006 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd rather avoid that turn of events, so I'll turn my attention back to the club president.

data.name: 0007 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't say that. I'd like to ask more questions.

data.name: 0008 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There isn't anything you didn't tell Haruhi, right?

data.name: 0009 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: There's nothing! I told you everything I know!

data.name: 0010 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Besides, getting involved with you lot is never a good idea.

data.name: 0011 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Could you stop interfering with our work?

data.name: 0012 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: U-um, please, we beg you for even a little bit of your time.

data.name: 0013 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Wha?! D-don't get so close!

data.name: 0014 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The moment Asahina asked, the club president recoiled in fear.

data.name: 0015 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems like he's still reeling from what happened in the past……

data.name: 0016 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When that happened, the true victim was Asahina you bastard.

data.name: 0017 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Committing the unforgivable sin of touching Asahina's chest. Unbelievable…

data.name: 0018 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You should be thankful you're still healthy.

data.name: 0019 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, it can't be denied that he's the victim of Haruhi's scheme.

data.name: 0020 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Kyon……

data.name: 0021 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In response to the club president's refusal, Asahina stared at me as if clinging to me with her eyes.

data.name: 0022 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's get straight out of here, Asahina.

data.name: 0023 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After suggesting a tactical retreat, Asahina nodded with relief.

data.name: 0024 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Um, we're sorry for intruding, people of the computer club.

data.name: 0025 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: If you can help it, don't come here.

data.name: 0026 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ohh…… But…

data.name: 0027 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Agh!

data.name: 0028 (364.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Stay in there, prez! Don't be seduced by her womanly charms!

data.name: 0029 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: R-r-r-r-r-right, of course! Those eyes won't work on me!

data.name: 0030 (364.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: If any more of our latest PCs are taken away by your brigade leader, it'd be a nightmare!

data.name: 0033 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Sorry… It's my fault, isn't it……

data.name: 0034 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's not true, Asahina.

data.name: 0035 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: No. It's because of me that the members of the computer club are so wary.

data.name: 0036 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's absolutely not true. The reason they're so wary is because of Haruhi.

data.name: 0037 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I definitely want asahina to know the difference.

data.name: 0038 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Rather than discussing it in the hallway, how about we go back to the clubroom and consider our options?

data.name: 0039 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: …… I suppose.

data.name: 0040 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh right.

data.name: 0041 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Since we're going back to the clubroom, I hope I can drink your delicious tea.

data.name: 0042 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina smiled at me happily in response to my words.

data.name: 0043 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Of course. I'll do my best to brew the best tea I can make.

data.name: 0045 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If it weren't an emergency, I'd happily enjoy the bliss of drinking tea with you, Asahina.

data.name: 0046 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As it stands, we're unfortunately in a tight spot right now, so it's not so easy.

data.name: 0047 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: For now, we just want information, right. I don't to hear their scary stories, but…

data.name: 0048 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: It would be a disaster if Suzumiya saw the strange occurrence you saw……

data.name: 0049 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We somehow need to get more details from the computer research society if we're going to get ahead.

data.name: 0050 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I've just become a hindrance to you.

data.name: 0051 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I mean, I'm not as capable as Nagato or Koizumi, and stuff.

data.name: 0052 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: …… I can't do anything.

data.name: 0053 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: More than that, because of me we can't ask them questions……

data.name: 0054 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina is clearly unaware that she's the SOS Brigade's indispensable shining angel of healing.

data.name: 0055 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's seriously depressed.

data.name: 0056 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If only Haruhi could pick up that restraint from Asahina.

data.name: 0057 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's not your fault at all.

data.name: 0058 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Because of you, I get to drink delicious tea.

data.name: 0059 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Kyon…… Thank you

data.name: 0060 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, I'm not sure how we should conquer the computer society……

data.name: 0061 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about I go ask them alone?

data.name: 0062 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: …… I am a hindrance, after all.

data.name: 0063 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait, actually let's go together.

data.name: 0064 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I make a flustered attempt to take back the tears gradually building up in her eyes.

data.name: 0065 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I had a heartbreaking self-reflection on how horrible I was to upset Asahina like that.

data.name: 0066 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……Right! Tea! Tea!

data.name: 0067 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about you deliver them some tea?

data.name: 0068 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ok. I guess that's something even I can do, right.

data.name: 0069 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not at all. This is something that only you can do, Asahina.

data.name: 0070 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about bringing them some tea?

data.name: 0071 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Bringing?

data.name: 0072 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Your deliciously brewed tea may serve to relax them around us.

data.name: 0073 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: They would be less weary with something so trivial?

data.name: 0074 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Us SOS Brigade members are used to this level of luxury, unlike the members of the computer society.

data.name: 0075 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I said so proudly.

data.name: 0076 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Eh? Luxury?

data.name: 0077 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She really has no awareness of what she does for us. Well, that is very like her, I suppose.

data.name: 0079 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Even though I told you not to come here. You lot really are shameless.

data.name: 0080 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, never mind that. How about some tea?

data.name: 0082 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Um, I don't know what tea you like, so it was quite hard to choose, but…

data.name: 0083 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I went for berry tea, since I thought it might be good for tired eyes.

data.name: 0084 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: And since you're all concentrating and thinking a lot, I thought maybe it would be best to add some sugar.

data.name: 0085 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I'll try to sweeten it up a little with some maple syrup.

data.name: 0086 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Relief from eyestrain and nourishment for the brain……?

data.name: 0087 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina brought some freshly brewed tea for you.

data.name: 0088 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You don't need it?

data.name: 0089 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: You all look tired, so would you like to take a little rest?

data.name: 0091 (364.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: A-ah……

data.name: 0092 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The SOS Brigade's oasis: Asahina's smile and the tea she brewed with love.

data.name: 0093 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The combo melted away the stubbornness of the Computer Society like spring on a snowy mountain.

data.name: 0095 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: …… Let's take a break.

data.name: 0097 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, about class 1-10…

data.name: 0098 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Oh! This berry tea is delicious! It feels like my head is being cleared!

data.name: 0099 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Thank you very much.

data.name: 0100 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Thanks to you, I feel like we can make an amazing game!

data.name: 0101 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Huh?! You're making a game?

data.name: 0102 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Oops, I didn't mean to let that slip! Don't tell anyone!

data.name: 0103 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ah, ok. It's a secret. I understand.

data.name: 0104 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: But, you can really make a game just by yourselves? That's amazing.

data.name: 0105 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Well, it's hopeless if you aren't as skilled as we are.

data.name: 0106 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm saying, I want to know more about class 1-10, you know.

data.name: 0107 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Even with the skills it's a huge undertaking.

data.name: 0108 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Either way, everything in the game is computer society original. We're not using any pre-existing engine.

data.name: 0109 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: E-engine? That's different to what makes a car move, right?

data.name: 0110 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Hahaha, well of course! Aren't you an amusing one.

data.name: 0111 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Huh…… I'm sorry I didn't know.

data.name: 0112 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Not at all! It's pleasantly refreshing to talk to someone unfamiliar.

data.name: 0113 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Could we quickly get to the matter of class 1-10……

data.name: 0114 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: What kind of games do you like, Asahina?

data.name: 0115 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Huh? Me?

data.name: 0116 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: You ask, but I haven't really played any……

data.name: 0117 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He's completely forgotten about his fears from earlier, and now won't leave Asahina alone.

data.name: 0118 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess this leaves me with only one option. I'm gonna say it.

data.name: 0119 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina hates games, you know.

data.name: 0120 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Eh?

data.name: 0121 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Really?

data.name: 0122 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So I don't think it's nice to force her to talk about them.

data.name: 0123 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: It's true that I don't know much about machines, but I wouldn't say I hate them……

data.name: 0124 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina said so as if she knew how the shocked club president was going to react.

data.name: 0125 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I'm surprised people like that still exist in Japan, the great country of games!

data.name: 0126 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: You probably qualify as a failure of a Japanese citizen!

data.name: 0127 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's a little extreme……

data.name: 0128 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Huh?! I-I'm a failure of a Japanese citizen?

data.name: 0129 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina took it seriously and appeared dumbfounded. What a pure-hearted person.

data.name: 0130 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sorry for hurting you……

data.name: 0131 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: All I mean is that Asahina isn't good with games.

data.name: 0132 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: She's probably troubled by being forced to talk about them.

data.name: 0133 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Is that so?

data.name: 0134 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ah, yes…… That's how I feel.

data.name: 0135 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She gave a sincere nod.

data.name: 0136 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I thought that was the case, and it seems I've hit the nail on the head.

data.name: 0137 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I don't know much about machines, and stuff……

data.name: 0138 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Also my reflexes are bad so I can't follow games……

data.name: 0139 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: That's alright. Not all games require good reflexes.

data.name: 0140 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: How about I teach you about games?

data.name: 0141 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Th-thank you.

data.name: 0142 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn it. My plan to shift the topic failed.

data.name: 0145 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: You're completely different to your brigade leader, aren't you!

data.name: 0146 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm not happy that he assumes we're all like Haruhi.

data.name: 0147 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On the other hand, I don't like him to becoming overly obsessed with Asahina.

data.name: 0148 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Especially as the club president has a mark in his criminal record for crimes against Asahina.

data.name: 0149 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I really envy you. You could say I'm jealous, even.

data.name: 0150 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The Computer Society members nodded in unison. This lack of progress is killing me.

data.name: 0151 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even now, unbeknownst to everyone, the world is in danger…… Probably.

data.name: 0152 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: How about you leave that scary brigade leader's brigade, and come join us, Asahina?

data.name: 0153 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hold on, what did you just say? She's the SOS Brigade's sole oasis!

data.name: 0154 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even if Koizumi says it's fine, Nagato would say nothing, and I would give a firm NO.

data.name: 0155 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no way Haruhi would allow that in the first place.

data.name: 0156 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: According to Haruhi, Asahina is the SOS Brigade's mascot, after all.

data.name: 0157 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I wonder what Haruhi will do when she finds out you said that……

data.name: 0159 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just by saying the name Haruhi, the club president's face went pale. Is now the time to say serves you right?

data.name: 0160 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If you want to try scouting Asahina, try again in 100 years.

data.name: 0161 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We won't hand Asahina over to the Computer Society.

data.name: 0162 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina is the SOS Brigade's angel.

data.name: 0163 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: The we, the Computer Society, shall worship her as a goddess! Whether day or night, we shall bow down to her graciousness.

data.name: 0164 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Please stop being creepy. The only one who'd want to be bowed down to is Haruhi.

data.name: 0165 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Um…… I don't feel like quitting the SOS Brigade. I'm sorry.

data.name: 0166 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: …… I see.

data.name: 0167 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no way she'll be the Computer Society's goddess.

data.name: 0168 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina's mission is to observe Haruhi. She can't quit.

data.name: 0169 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wish I could say she's with us because she wants to be, though.

data.name: 0172 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thank you for giving up on recruiting her so quickly.

data.name: 0173 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After that, the Computer Society president and club members…

data.name: 0174 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: … didn't leave us alone for a while.

data.name: 0175 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Really? That sounds really tough.

data.name: 0176 (364.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Oh my. You're the only one who understands us.

data.name: 0177 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: It sounds like tough work. Good luck, and try your best.

data.name: 0179 (364.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Indeed. We will do the best we can.

data.name: 0180 (364.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: It's amazing. I really respect it.

data.name: 0182 (364.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: R-respect…… Wow. How brilliant.

data.name: 0183 (364.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Good grief……

data.name: 0184 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In the end, we heard three times as much complaining and boasting as we did information about class 1-10.

data.name: 0185 (364.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That was probably a waste of time.

data.name: 0186 (364.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: I'll go alone.

data.name: 0187 (364.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Bring tea.

data.name: 0188 (364.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: She hates games.

data.name: 0189 (364.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: She's not good with games.

data.name: 0190 (364.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Haruhi won't forgive you.

data.name: 0191 (364.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: As if we'll hand her over to you.
